purpose: Defines the payload structure and cryptographic sealing requirements for all forensic telemetry sourced post-IH, fulfilling the P-R03 mandate.

payload_schema.acvm_parameters_snapshot: Object (Frozen state of ACVM at IH)
payload_schema.raw_telemetry_bundle: Array of Objects (As defined in Telemetry Spec)
payload_schema.cryptographic_seal: String (P-256 Signature of the complete payload)

delivery_constraint: The sealed FDLS artifact must be verifiable by the AASS service against the Integrity Spec before presentation to the DIAL Engine.
